sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import '../style.css' import '../contact.css' import '../gallery.css' import '../responsive.css' import '../Skills.css' // Contact form const scriptURL = 'https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbxFsBJTY1KB3hAOr0cXQjHznz71reKzviP73OkomaxOJghiO_ZYY2Bd-uSF_dZVZzmQ/exec' const form = document.forms['contactform'] form.addEventListener('submit', e => { e.preventDefault() fetch(scriptURL, { method: 'POST', body: new FormData(form) }) .then(response => alert("Thank you! your form is submitted successfully.")) .then(() => { window.location.reload(); }) .catch(error => console.error('Error!', error.message)) }) document.getElementById("#submit-btn").on('click', function(){ document.querySelector("#submit-btn").val("SUBMITTING!") }) // Skills document.getElementsByClassName(".Skills-btn").click(function(){ document.querySelector("#Skills").load(" #Skills") }) export class Contact extends Component { render() { return (

Connect With Me

) } } export default Contact
